item.description:
Due to the heavy rain, I think it best to postpone our meetup til next Sunday. I think everyone will agree with me that their pugs (most of them) will look at the rain and say "What, you want me to go out there? Are you nuts?"

See you next week. Same pug time, same pug channel!

Marie

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: The Manchester Pug April Meetup
